projectGridLines.stationName: Grasim Industries Ltd., Birla Cellulose, Staple Fibre Division
projectGridLines.title: Sensor based solution development to detect blade breakage in fibre  cutter
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project involves the development of online tool to detect real

time cutter blade breakage. Project would involve algorithm development in

python, testing on site and incorporation of dashboard to generate alert in real

time to operators.
